Update 04/13/12: Tickets have been purchased.

For this Meet-up we will return to the Gamm Theater for "1984." Here is the description on the Gamm's website:

"War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength. The Gamm breathes fresh life into George Orwell’s landmark novel with a bold retelling of the political satirist’s hauntingly prophetic story. In a totalitarian world at war, with Big Brother watching and the Thought Police on his heels, Winston Smith clings stubbornly to his vision of a different future. What starts as an act of rebellion and hope rapidly unravels in a nightmare of doomed love, personal betrayal and the terrors of Room 101. British playwright Nick Lane’s spare script, punctuated by chilling multi-media effects, resonates now more than ever."

Ticket Information

Tickets are $46.75 (including Gamm's Convenience Charge.). Seating is reserved. (Prices at Gamm have gone up for 2011/12.  They are now $42.00 plus a $4.75 convenience charge.)

Tickets appear to be selling fast.  Therefore, RSVPs for this Meetup will close on Thursday, April 12th. I will purchase the tickets on the 13th.

Meet-up Logistics

We will meet at the Gamm Theater at 7:30 PM. I will also provide my cell number in case you need to reach me.

Payment Options

When you RSVP, there will be a question asking how you wish to pay for your ticket.  Please note that I must have payment prior to 04/13/12 so I can purchase our tickets.  I'm open to any option other than a personal check.  Here are my preferred choices:

1) If you're going to another Meetup with me prior to 04/13/12, you may pay me in cash or cashiers check at that time.

2) I can provide my mailing address and you can send me a cashiers check or money order.  (No personal checks.)  Remember, though, that I need it before 04/13/12.

3) Provide your e-mail address and I will send you a Paypal Invoice.  You may use that invoice to pay by credit card or direct bank debit.  Note that you do NOT need a Paypal account to pay by credit card.

Refund Policy

Full refunds (including the convenience charge) will be provided if you change your RSVP to "NO" on or before 04/12/12.

Full refunds (including the convenience charge) will be provided if the play is sold out and we are unable to get tickets.

Once tickets are purchased on 04/13/12, no refunds will be provided.  You will be responsible for the disposal of your ticket if you're unable to attend.
